thread.title: Evelyn

author: Evelyn
title: Evelyn
text: At first I was a bit hesitant because of how cheap the prices are. I had lost my friends glasses and had to replace asap but couldnt afford $300+ So I took the chance and it was the best choice I ever made. It came with a official Gucci case, bag and cloth. So legit it looked like I bought it at the official store. Fast shipping what more can you want!!
